modName: Sexy Followers of Skyrim - Now With ACE Perks
summary: Sexy Follower\'s of Skyrim adds three beautiful companions to the game. They were created from some of the best save game files on the Nexus. There is an optional version that adds appropriate perks from the ACE combat mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#DB7900][size=18][b]Sexy Follower\'s of Skyrim - Now With ACE Perks[/b][/size][/color][/center]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22446-1-1345001208.jpg[/img]

[size=6][b][color=red][u]Description[/size][/b][/color][/u]
This mod adds three beautiful followers to the game. The ladies were created by converting some of the best save games on the Nexus into companions. I have included two files to choose from. One file is vanilla followers with no perks. The other file is the same, except the followers have extensive perks from the ACE combat mod (ACE mod required obviously). The women can be found at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun, and they will equip their armor after you fast travel with them.

[size=6][b][color=red][u]The Ladies[/size][/b][/color][/u]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/mjyaah.png[/IMG]
[b]Adriana[/b] is an Imperial that was created in a save game by Maevan2 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19792]Savegame Adriana[/url]. She is a ranger skilled in 1 handed weapons, archery and light armor. The ACE version has all corresponding perks. She is equipped with basic leather armor and beginner weapons.

[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zcp9j7.png[/IMG]
[b]Malise[/b] is a Nord created in the save game by JosefGrey [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14258]Malise Savegame[/url]. She is skilled in 2 handed and heavy armor, and the ACE version has the corresponding perks. Starting gear is an iron greatsword, and iron armor.

[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2115rnt.png[/IMG]
[b]Ariana[/b] is an Imperial from the save game by JolieAnna [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/135]Ariana Save[/url]. She is a frontline warrior, skilled in 1 handed, heavy armor, and blocking. The ACE version includes perks for these skills. She starts the game with an iron mace, iron shield, and iron armor.

[size=6][b][color=red][u]Installation[/size][/b][/color][/u]
Use the Nexus Mod Manager, or download the file and extract it to your Skyrim folder. Easy.

[size=6][b][color=red][u]Recommended Mods[/size][/b][/color][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10037]Ace Combat[/url] is required to use the version of my mod that includes ACE perks. Not required for the vanilla NO perks version. 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] to get the same hairstyles I used. Note, download both the main file and also the optional file that adds 10 new female hairstyles.

[size=6][b][color=red][u]Incompatible Mods[/size][/b][/color][/u]
It should be highly compatible with all mods, except mods that alter the Drunken Tavern. The version with ACE perks could conflict with mods that alter perks. The followers have a level cap of 300, so there may or may not be an issue if you are not using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1175]Elys Uncapper[/url]. I have not tested.

[size=6][b][color=red][u]Other Useful Mods[/size][/b][/color][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7554]Better Followers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Body Replacer[/url]
A cosmetic mod such as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Coverwomen[/url].
author: MonsterMod
